text: We contacted LetaGeek and they were very quick to respond and helped us set up an appointment the next day. The technician was professional and and friendly! He helped us mount our 2 TVs under an hour, greatly exceeding our expectations‚Ä¶we highly recommend their services!

This was an amazing experience. Beshoy was friendly, informative, and very good at his job. He was explaining what he was doing every step of the way and made sure we were satisfied with the end result. You think mounting a tv is straight forward but there‚Äôs a lot that goes into it. If I have any other future tv to mount, I know exactly who to ask. Thanks Beshoy!
I recently hired LetaGeek to mount my TV, and they totally nailed it. Great price compared to Geeksquad. Professional, great work, and super friendly. Highly recommended for a stress-free mount!

Beshoy is super friendly and very professional! He was thorough and gave explanations and recommendations every step of the way! I‚Äôm super satisfied and happy with his service! I highly recommend him and LetAGeek!
Beshoy did an amazing job mounting our tv! He even gave us some tips on making our next tv purchase when we need it. Good price as well. I will definitely use Leta Geek again in the future.
Beshoy did a great job mounting my TV. I could tell he knew what he was doing with his explanations and options he provided me. He was quick, efficient, and respectful

The tech that arrived to mount my tv was awesome. He was professional , had great communication about my options for placement. He was done in less than 30 minutes. I will definitely be recommending him to my friends and family !
I had such a great experience. Not only was he very flexible with day and time but he was prompt and courteous. The work was done perfectly & very fast...I strongly recommend!

The gentleman was on time and very professional. Install took maybe 20 minutes. Center and level and he made sure everything turned on before he left. I called a few places and he was one of two companies who were able to come same day.
Great service and quick response. Scheduled last minute but was provided service the same day. Would definitely recommend
Amazing work‚Ä¶Punctual, great communication‚Ä¶they know what they are doing and have reasonable prices‚Ä¶They have done 2 jobs for me ‚Ä¶I will be hiring from now ‚Ä¶Two Thumbs up üëçüèæ üëçüèæ

Beshoy was so great!! He has installed TVs for us twice already. He is friendly, professional, and punctual (very important). He comes prepared and very knowledgeable. We will definitely use his services again and recommend to our friends and family.

Beshoy was very helpful and did an excellent job mounting our new TV. He showed great attention to detail and was extremely professional. He was easy to reach, showed up early, and worked very efficiently. I would definitely reach out to him again in the future and highly recommend him to anyone looking to mount a TV.

Beshoy was quick and efficient with the time he spent here! He explained how it worked as well and was overall a pleasant guy to do business with. The pricing is fair considering he came and finished the installation in like 15 minutes. 10/10 would recommend!
I called to get a quote today (9/5/20) an ended up getting my tv mounted the same day. Quick service and I‚Äôm one happy camper üòÅ.

Beshoy was quick to respond to my inquiry. He came out twice to mount a total of 4 TVs. He came out same day the first time. Amazing! Very reasonable pricing and the end product was perfect. I strongly recommend Letageek to anyone needing their services in the area. They are quick, efficient, and very professional.
Beshoy was very polite, answered our many questions; he did such a great job we had him mount the bedroom tv as well.
Beshoy is awesome! He has installed Ring and mounted TV‚Äôs for us. Honest, reasonably priced and dependable. He is extremely knowledgeable in what he does. Highly recommend him.

AMAZING service! Highly recommend. I'm so satisfied with the service and so happy how everything looks. He mounted two TV's in a very short time and in a perfect way. I couldn't be happier with the results :))))
Beshoy was punctual, clean and did a great job. 2 TV mounts in less than an hour. I‚Äôd definitely use his services again.

I wanted to mount a TV in my Bedroom. I looked around and found that Letageek had the best price so I booked an appointment with them. They showed up on time and did an amazing job mounting the TV where I exactly wanted it. I'll definitely use them again if I ever want another TV mounted
